|ftname=1955 Atlantic hurricane season |currentstatus=GA |topic=meteorology }} {{hurricane|class=A|importance=Mid|storms-task-force=yes|atl-task-force=yes}} {{WikiProject Caribbean|class=A|importance=low|Cayman Islands=yes|Cayman Islands-importance=low}}
==Todo== Needs more impact. [[User:Jdorje|Jdorje]] 04:14, 11 January 2006 (UTC)
== Lack of retirement ==
There needs to be something about ''why'' Hilda was not retired. As I understand it as a decided non-expert, a storm causing this much damage should be almost a dead cert for retirement. If there's stuff available about why it wasn't retired, that really needs to be in the article. [[User:Loganberry|Loganberry]] ([[User talk:Loganberry|Talk]]) 22:14, 16 September 2007 (UTC)
== Vandalism? ==
The current revision of the article credits Hilda as a Category 5 hurricane. Where the heck did that come from? --Dylan620 ([[User:Dylan620|<font color="red"><small>Home</small></font>]] • [[User talk:Dylan620|<font color="green"><small>yadda yadda yadda</small></font>]] • [[Special:Contributions/Dylan620|<font color="purple"><small>Ooooohh!</small></font>]]) 00:02, 11 November 2008 (UTC) :[http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Hurricane_Hilda_(1955)&diff=244035918&oldid=239457006 Fixed]. –[[User:Juliancolton|Juliancolton]] [[User talk:Juliancolton|<font color="#66666"><sup>'''T'''ropical</sup></font>]] [[Special:contributions/Juliancolton|<font color="#66666"><sup>'''C'''yclone</sup></font>]] 00:27, 11 November 2008 (UTC) ::Thank you. Funny thing is, that error hadn't been caught for over a month! --Dylan620 ([[User:Dylan620|<font color="red"><small>Home</small></font>]] • [[User talk:Dylan620|<font color="green"><small>yadda yadda yadda</small></font>]] • [[Special:Contributions/Dylan620|<font color="purple"><small>Ooooohh!</small></font>]]) 12:44, 11 November 2008 (UTC) :::Indeed, but non-blatant vandalism tends to stick around a bit longer. –[[User:Juliancolton|Juliancolton]] [[User talk:Juliancolton|<font color="#66666"><sup>'''T'''ropical</sup></font>]] [[Special:contributions/Juliancolton|<font color="#66666"><sup>'''C'''yclone</sup></font>]] 15:25, 11 November 2008 (UTC)
